name:
ARC STYLE:
Everyday Football
description:
"ARC STYLE: Everyday Football" is a simple DSiware football game without complex football rules. Simple controls allow anyone to enjoy the game.

Edit teams

Edit football players from teams around the world from a total of 32 countries such as "England" and "Brazil"! Lead your team to the top!

DS Wireless Play, DS Download Play

Play against your friends connecting 2 DSi.

In download play mode, only 1 copy of the game is needed for multi-player mode. DS and DS Lite can be connected as well.
